application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Mountain View, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA; Pittsburgh, PA, USA
description:
gTech’s Product and Tools Operations team (gPTO) leverages deep user, operational, and technical insights to innovate Google's Ads products into customer experiences that are so intuitive (or automated) that they require no support at all. gPTO partners closely with gTech’s Support, Professional Services, Product Management, and Engineering teams to innovate and simplify our Ads products and build the productivity tools ecosystem for gTech users.

The team plays a critical role in Google's success, supporting Sales teams, advertisers, and products that enhance business growth potential by consistently providing scalable product solutions, reliable information based on efficient, consultative analysis and timely communications.

As a Product Technology Manager, you'll partner with the Product Operations Managers, Global Sales Leads and Product Managers/Engineering to oversee the technical execution of Google's online advertising and platform products from design and conceptualization to testing and deployment to drive customer adoption and satisfaction.

Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of solution-oriented trusted advisors support millions of customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.

To learn more about gTech, check out our video.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
  • 2 years of programming experience in Java, Python, C++ or JavaScript.
  • Experience with HTTP, HTML, XML, DNS and TCP/IP.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience working with Unix systems and application development.
  • Experience with programming mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
  • Experience in consulting, sales engineering, technical sales or field sales.
  • Developed understanding of relational database administration in MySQL or equivalent.
  • Ability to present technical materials to large audiences. Excellent communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Be responsible for the end-to-end incubation and implementation of alpha and beta products.
  • Provide technical implementation support to clients, including guidance on implementation feasibility of cross-product integrations.
  • Develop technical tools and documentation to expedite client implementation and improve product serviceability.
  • Collaborate with Engineering teams to test use-cases and commercialize solutions.
  • Provide product solution improvement and scaling opportunities to Product Managers and Engineering teams based on early customer feedback. Develop fast prototyping solutions.
title: Product Technology Manager, Google
